report.title: The Green Chill Pill
report.author: Octosphere
report.bodytext: Sneakin around in my dad's stuff, and there you have it! A pill bottle that says may cause drowsiness! Triazolam (halcion) is what it said and it said take one every night for sleep. I did it a couple of times and noticed some good things and some bad things. /n /n First up, the good news: /n - On a dose of just one pill, I got a very mild buzz and a slightly mild feel of relaxation. /n - On a dose of 2 pills, I noticed and greater buzz: things were more wavy and my head was heavier. I got more of a relaxed sleepy feeling. /n - On a dose of 3 pills, I noticed a very nice buzz much like the buzz I get with 10mg or 20mg of Ambien. Its Like the buzz I would want to have taking it as a psychedelic. But after about 20 minutes of fun, its sleeping time. It makes me really tired. /n /n Now, the Bad news: /n - Triazolam makes me tired and sleepy /n - It takes about 30 - 45 minutes to kick in. (that is normal though) /n - I must take it on an empty stomach or I will not feel any buzz at all! I will just feel tired... /n /n Well, that's my experience of Triazolam, it is not something I would like to take for enjoyment. Yet, it makes a wonderful sleeping pill and I wake up nice and relaxed by morning!
